title: Awkward lagging in games
body:
I don't know what or why it is happening, but I feel like their has been a lot of unusual lag as of late. I don't know how else to describe this lag. I typically get 65ms ping in a match, and on the higher end about 120ms. It is a manageable amount, but enough to make me jealous of people who claim their is 30ms. But lately I will start initiating combat with the other player(s), and I feel like all my moves stop working. I will look up at my ping and it jumps to 600-800ms. When I die or recall (or just retreat enough) it seems to go down. It is very peculiar...

I had thought it was my PC, ran the Hextech repair tool (because your website's log tracker shows that i get amazing packet loss randomly) but that doesnt seem to have worked.

The weird part of all this is that both my brother who plays league with me, and a co-worker friend of mine have also been complaining of this exact problem. I also see people complaining in chat about constantly as well.

I don't know what or why it is happening, but I know if no one complains about it, no one will know to fix it

replies.body: Thanks for taking the steps so far to troubleshoot this.   Confirming packet loss with the log reader also helps a lot!  The hextech repair tool is a great resources, but it doesn't fix everything!  I recommend also going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) issues guide to help strengthen your PC.  If that doesn't fix you up, then your ISP could also be routing a long distance to reach our game servers.  Let me know if the connection issues guide helps, otherwise we'll go from there!
